alert.note: Alert for Montrose; Ouray (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued October 01 at 5:29PM MDT until October 01 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: The National Weather Service in Grand Junction has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Ouray County in southwestern Colorado... South central Montrose County in west central Colorado... * Until 600 PM MDT. * At 528 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 11 miles north of Norwood, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of northwestern Ouray and south central Montrose Counties. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare immediately for large hail and damaging winds. People outside should move immediately to shelter inside a strong building. Stay away from windows.
